name: Skype for Business
description: Skype for Business plugin for Mattermost.

settings.help_text: The product type of your Skype for Business instance.

Username of your selected bot account. We strongly recommend using a dedicated bot account for this plugin, rather than an existing Skype for Business user account. Only required for Skype for Business Server.
Password of your selected bot account. Only required for Skype for Business Server.
The domain of your Skype for Business server instance. For example, contoso.com. Only required for Skype for Business Server.

Application ID from the Azure Active Directory. Only required for Skype for Business Online. Use this URL to configure the plugin in Azure Active Directory: ```https://SITEURL/plugins/skype4business/api/v1/auth_redirect```

settings.display_name: Enable logging requests to S4B server
settings.help_text: Logging requests sent to S4B server for debugging purposes. Used only with Skype for Business Server. These logs will use the `INFO` log level, so make sure that `Console Log Level` is set to `INFO` in the `System Console`.

settings_schema.footer: To report an issue, make a suggestion or a contribution, [check the repository](https://github.com/kosgrz/mattermost-plugin-skype4business).
